SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.index

Class IndexCheck

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.index.IndexCheck
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class IndexCheck extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Index checker. Offers multiple methods of checking the index. The main method is check(IndexCheckMode).

  • Constructor Details

    • IndexCheck

      public IndexCheck(@NotNull @NotNull Configuration configuration)
      Parameters:
      configuration - configuration based on which to perform the check

    • IndexCheck

      public IndexCheck(@NotNull @NotNull Configuration configuration, Collection<String> projectNames)
      Parameters:
      configuration - configuration based on which to perform the check
      projectNames - collection of project names. If non-empty, only projects matching these paths will be checked. Otherwise, either the sole index or all project indexes will be checked, depending on whether projects are enabled in the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • check

      public void check(IndexCheck.IndexCheckMode mode) throws IOException, IndexCheckException
      Check index(es). If the check is successful, just return. On failure, an exception will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      mode - index check mode
      Throws:
      IOException - on I/O error
      IndexCheckException - if some of the indexes failed the check. The exception contains list of the paths.
